description: Gets information about a wireless gateway task.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource to get.

nested_items.name: WirelessGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: LastUplinkReceivedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the most recent uplink was received.

nested_items.name: TaskCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the task was created.
